Class CourseListUI

java.lang.Object
CourseListUI
public class CourseListUI extends Object
The CourseListUI class represents a user interface window that displays a list of courses in a table format. It can optionally show the courses associated with a specific student.

This class uses a Controller object to retrieve course and student data, and displays the data in a scrollable JTable within a JFrame.

The window is centered relative to a given parent JFrame and disposes itself on close.

  • Field Summary

    CourseListUI(Controller controller, JFrame parent, String studentName)
    Constructs a CourseListUI window displaying courses associated with the specified student, or all courses if the student name is null.

  • Constructor Details

    • CourseListUI

      public CourseListUI(Controller controller, JFrame parent)
      Constructs a CourseListUI window displaying all courses. The window is centered relative to the specified parent frame.
      Parameters:
      controller - the controller instance to access data
      parent - the parent JFrame relative to which this window is centered

    • CourseListUI

      public CourseListUI(Controller controller, JFrame parent, String studentName)
      Constructs a CourseListUI window displaying courses associated with the specified student, or all courses if the student name is null. The window is centered relative to the specified parent frame.
      Parameters:
      controller - the controller instance to access data
      parent - the parent JFrame relative to which this window is centered
      studentName - the name of the student whose courses to display; if null, all courses are displayed
